tweet.html: RT @joewiz: If you’re in or near Bern, Switzerland, please join us for a workshop on June 27 on “Editing Diplomatic Documents in a TEI-XML World”, with case studies from @Dodis & @HistoryAtState, led by me, Christiane Sibille, @SachaZala, and @wolfgangm twitter.com/dodis/status/1…
